org.daisy.streamline.cli

Class SwitchArgument

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.streamline.cli.Definition
      • org.daisy.streamline.cli.SwitchArgument

  • public class SwitchArgument
extends Definition
    Provides a definition for switch arguments.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SwitchArgument

        public SwitchArgument(char key,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String value,
                      java.lang.String desc)
        Creates a switch argument. If the key is found in the command, e.g. -c then it should be substituted by [name]=[value]
        Parameters:
        key - the switch key
        name - the name of the argument
        value - the value for the argument
        desc - a description of the switch
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if key is null

      • SwitchArgument

        public SwitchArgument(java.lang.String alias,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String value,
                      java.lang.String desc)
        Creates a switch argument. If the key is found in the command, e.g. -c then it should be substituted by [name]=[value]
        Parameters:
        alias - the switch alias
        name - the name of the argument
        value - the value for the argument
        desc - a description of the switch
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if alias is less than two characters
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if alias is null

      • SwitchArgument

        public SwitchArgument(java.lang.Character key,
                      java.lang.String alias,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String value,
                      java.lang.String desc)
        Creates a switch argument. If the key is found in the command, e.g. -c then it should be substituted by [name]=[value]
        Parameters:
        key - the switch key
        alias - the switch alias
        name - the name of the argument
        value - the value for the argument
        desc - a description of the switch
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if alias is less than two characters
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if both key and alias are null

    • Method Detail

        Gets the value for the argument when found

        public java.lang.Character getKey()
        Gets the switch key
        Returns:
        the switch key, or null if not set

      • getAlias

        public java.lang.String getAlias()
        Gets the switch alias (long name)
        Returns:
        returns the alias, or null if not set
